Invocation Name: r. d. v. s.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Radio Voie du Salut is a non-profit, community-based, and volunteer-run radio station under the Philadelphie French SDA Church of Malden, MA. Revelation 14:6-12

Detailed description -Radio Voie du Salut is a non-profit, community-based, and volunteer-run radio station under the Philadelphie SDA Church of Malden, MA. The mission of this Seventh-day Adventist Radio is to make disciples of all people, communicating the everlasting gospel in the context of the three angels’ messages of Revelation 14:6-12, leading them to accept Jesus as their personal Savior, and unite with His remnant Church, discipline them to serve Him as Lord and preparing them for His soon return.

We seek to educate, inspire, and entertain through programming that reflects the diversity of our community and worldwide listeners. We proclaim to the entire world, in these last days, the everlasting gospel of God’s love, most fully revealed in His Son’s life, ministry, atoning death, resurrection, and high priestly ministry. We recognize the Bible to be God’s infallible revelation of His will; we present its entire message, including the second advent of Christ and the continuing authority of His Ten Commandment law with its reminder of the Seventh-day Sabbath.
priv:
